events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website and would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's request to return the jacket due to sizing issues was categorized as a refund request.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.

Sure, my order number is 12345678. The jacket is completely unworn and in its original packaging, with all tags intact.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label offer. I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your full refund to the original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything was satisfactory with our service. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
As no further requests were received, we are closing your refund case now. Thank you for choosing our service.
